content: Shinhan-flow의 액션들을 나열할게 잔액 : { "type":"BalanceNotificationAction", "account":"000000000000" }, 환전 : { "type":"ExchangeAction", "currency":"USD", "FromAccount":"000000000000", "amount":0 }, 환율 알림 : { "type":"ExchangeRateNotificationAction", "currency":"USD" }, text 알림 : { "type":"TextNotificationAction", "text":"얼른 운동가자" }, 송금 : { "type":"TransferAction", "fromAccount":"123-123-123456", "toAccount":"456-456-456789", "amount":0 }
